segments.text: Sir , I want to ask for a leave for five days . Here is the request form .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me see your form . You mentioned that you want five days to go back home for New Year , right ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I need to go home to have a family reunion .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you still remember we already have a New Year celebration on January 1st ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , sir . I remember it . But our Chinese usually celebrate the New Year on lunar calendar .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I understand that . Your request is approved . Remember to give my best regards to your parents .
segments.speaker: S2
